product_name: GSI Outdoors Stainless-Steel Flask and Funnel Set
long_description: This GSI stainless-steel flask carries up to 7 fl. oz. of your favorite liquid without leaking. Flip-top retainer keeps the lid attached to the flask. Smooth, streamlined design fits easily in your hip pocket. Comes with a funnel so you can fill flask without spilling. Both funnel and flask are made of high-quality stainless steel.
short_description: This GSI stainless-steel flask carries up to 7 fl. oz. of your favorite liquid without leaking.
